content: my dad was in the korean war,he was stationed at the DMZ. what I need help with is I'm looking for his DMZ patch. it has a white background with a few mountains at the botom of it with an eye just above that then the letter DMZ and above that it has 3 different colored lines on it. If any has or knows of anyone that might have that patch please get in touch with me through my e-mail...email deleted, personal contact information is not authorized.This patch means alot to my dad and being he's 74 years old, I would like to try and find this patch by fathers day if possiable. Somebody somewhere has got to know where I can find this patch...please help me!!!! This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Thu 04 June 2009 06:57 AM
